title: Game wont load in
body: My game got to the loading screen then it wouldn't load to the actually game and keeps giving me leaver buster timers. Fix your game or you lose a summoner quiet simple.

replies.body:
Issues like these more often than not are local to your computer/connection.

Go to lagreport.com, it's a Riot run website that should tell you if it's your connection (or your ISPs) that's the problem. If it is then try running through the steps here: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#connection

If it's not your connection then try running through the steps here: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#matchmaking

If none of those help. try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

> [{quoted}](name=AoL ScrubLord,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=hABo6Hq4,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-02-02T23:27:55.438+0000)
>
> Fix your game

Lmao.
Fix your computer, the problem is on your end.
